gameview.sView

Class SGameModePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gameview.sView.SGameModePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SGameModePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This is the panel which is shown after pressing "new game" in the start menu. The left one is for choosing the map. If you had chosen a map in the right panel, settings for the gameplay will appear. You can set the number of players. More options are possible.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Raphael A.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
